Trigger.name: Primary Prompt
Trigger.script:
if not snd.channeling then cecho(" <red>[<white>"..snd.target.."<red>]") if not snd.firstaid then snd.send("firstaid on") end if snd.offense_loaded then local msg snd.battle_aff = "none" snd.chasten_aff = "none" snd.last_cured = "" snd.rebounded = false snd.run_alerts() if #snd.alertness >= 1 and snd.toggles.affcalling then dir = snd.parseDir(snd.alertnessDir) msg = "wt ["..string.upper(snd.alertType).."] -"..string.upper(dir).."- " for i in pairs(snd.alertness) do msg = msg..snd.alertness[i].." " end snd.send(msg) end snd.alertness = {} snd.alertnessDir = "none" end
snd.last_affs = {} snd.last_aff = "" snd.maybe_affs = {} snd.defended = false snd.core()
if snd.delete_prompt then deleteLine() snd.delete_prompt = false end
if snd.bashing_loaded then if snd.new.area then if gmcp.Room.Info.area == "the Shattered Vortex" then x, y = string.match(gmcp.Char.Status.level, "(.*) (.*)") level = tonumber(x) if gmcp.Char.Name.name == "Rihrin" then area = "the Shattered Vortex (All)" elseif level < 100 then area = "the Shattered Vortex (Low Level)" elseif snd.faction == "spirit" then area = "the Shattered Vortex (Spirit)" elseif snd.faction == "shadow" then area = "the Shattered Vortex (Shadow)" end if area ~= snd.my.area then cecho("\n<green>Entering: "..area) snd.load_targets(area) send(" ") end else cecho("\n<green>Entering: "..gmcp.Room.Info.area) snd.load_targets(gmcp.Room.Info.area) send(" ") end snd.new.area = false end if snd.new.room and snd.toggles.fasthunt then if bot.going and (snd.pathing or speedWalkCounter ~=0) then return end send("who here", false) end if snd.new.room and snd.vermin_on then send("who here", false) end end
snd.new.room = false
if snd.gui_loaded then snd.aff_list = {} for maff in pairs(snd.afflictions) do if snd.have_aff(maff) then if not table.contains(snd.aff_list, maff) then if snd.afflictions[maff]["cures"]["herb"] ~= nil or snd.afflictions[maff]["cures"]["salve"] ~= nil or snd.afflictions[maff]["cures"]["smoke"] ~= nil then table.insert(snd.aff_list, maff) end end end end if #snd.aff_list >= 1 then display_my_affs() else myaffs:echo("<center>".."my affs".."</center>") end
toggles:clear() toggles2:clear() local tgs = {"attacking", "bashing", "fasthunt"} for tog in pairs(tgs) do if snd.toggles[tgs[tog]] then toggles:cecho("\n<green>"..tgs[tog]) else toggles:cecho("\n<red>"..tgs[tog]) end end local tgs = {"affcalling", "calling", "listening"} for tog in pairs(tgs) do if snd.toggles[tgs[tog]] then toggles2:cecho("\n<green>"..tgs[tog]) else toggles2:cecho("\n<red>"..tgs[tog]) end end end
if not snd.have_aff("recklessness") and not snd.have_aff("blackout") then snd.percentesthealth = gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp snd.percentestmana = gmcp.Char.Vitals.mp snd.lasthealth = gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp snd.lastmana = gmcp.Char.Vitals.mp end
local healthchangeval = 0
if gmcp.Char.Vitals ~= nil then healthchangeval = (tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp) - tonumber(snd.lasthealth)) if not snd.have_aff("blackout") then if tonumber(healthchangeval) ~= "0" then if tonumber(snd.lasthealth) > tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp) then cecho("<red>\[\- " ..healthchangeval.. " \-\]") elseif tonumber(snd.lasthealth) < tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp) then cecho("<cyan>\[\+ " ..healthchangeval.. " +\]") end end end snd.percenthealth = (tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp) / tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) * 100) snd.percenthealth = roundDown(snd.percenthealth,0) snd.percentmana = (tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.mp) / tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxmp) * 100) snd.percentmana = roundDown(snd.percentmana,0) end
if gmcp.Char.Vitals.herb == "1" then snd.herbalance = true else snd.herbalance = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.salve == "1" then snd.salvebal = true else snd.salvebal = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.focus == "1" then snd.focus = true else snd.focus = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.tree == "1" then snd.tree = true else snd.tree = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.pipe == "1" then snd.pipebalance = true else snd.pipebalance = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.renew == "1" then snd.recon = true else snd.recon = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.moss == "1" then snd.moss = true else snd.moss = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.elixir == "1" then snd.healbalance = true else snd.healbalance = false end
snd.stance = gmcp.Char.Vitals.stance snd.firstaidsalve()
if snd.have_aff("asleep") and not snd.waking and not snd.have_aff("stun") and not snd.have_aff("unconscious") then send("qeb wake") send("qeb wake") snd.waking = true if waketimer_timer then killTimer(waketimer_timer) end waketimer_timer = tempTimer(3.0,[[if snd.have_aff("asleep") then snd.waking = false end]]) end
if not snd.have_aff("stun") and not snd.have_aff("unconscious") and not snd.have_aff("asleep") then if snd.have_aff("prone") and snd.restand and snd.equilibrium then if not snd.writheaffflag and not snd.have_aff("paralysis") and (not snd.have_aff("right_leg_damaged") or not snd.have_aff("left_leg_damaged")) and not snd.have_aff("right_leg_broken") and not snd.have_aff("left_leg_broken") and not snd.have_aff("frozen") then if snd.class == "Monk" then if not snd.kipup then snd.send("qeb kipup") snd.kipup = true end end if not snd.firstaid then snd.send("qeb stand") snd.restand = false if restandtimer_timer then killTimer(restandtimer_timer) end restandtimer_timer = tempTimer(2,[[snd.restand = true]]) end end end end
if snd.nextcurecheck and snd.endgameuse ~= "none" and not snd.firstaid then
if #snd.aff_list > 2 and tonumber(snd.percentmana) > 60 and tonumber(snd.percentestmana) > 60 and not snd.tree and not snd.endgamequeue then snd.endgamecheck() elseif #snd.aff_list > 2 and tonumber(snd.percentmana) > 60 and tonumber(snd.percentestmana) > 60 and not snd.herbalance and (snd.have_aff("paralysis") or snd.have_aff("paresis")) and not snd.endgamequeue then snd.endgamecheck() elseif #snd.aff_list > 2 and not snd.tree and snd.class_hitting ~= "luminary" and not snd.endgamequeue then snd.endgamecheck() elseif #snd.aff_list > 2 and not snd.herbalance and tonumber(snd.percentmana) > 39 and snd.class_hitting ~= "luminary" and (snd.have_aff("paralysis") or snd.have_aff("paresis")) and not snd.endgamequeue then snd.endgamecheck() elseif (snd.have_aff("paralysis") or snd.have_aff("paresis")) and (snd.have_aff("crippled_body") or snd.have_aff("crippled")) and not snd.endgamequeue then snd.endgamecheck() elseif snd.endgamequeue and #snd.aff_list < 3 then snd.send("queue renew") end
end
snd.staonenonbal()
if #snd.aff_list > 0 and not snd.firstaid then snd.mastercheck() end
snd.staone()
--snd.sipfunction()
if snd.moss and not snd.firstaid then if tonumber(snd.percenthealth) < 75 or tonumber(snd.percentmana) < 75 or snd.have_aff("plodding") or snd.have_aff("idiocy") and not snd.firstaid then if not snd.have_aff("anorexia") and not snd.have_aff("destroyed_throat") and not snd.have_aff("stun") then snd.eatmoss() end elseif snd.have_aff("recklessness") or snd.have_aff("blackout") then if not snd.have_aff("anorexia") and not snd.have_aff("destroyed_throat") and not snd.have_aff("stun") then snd.eatmoss() end end end
if snd.clottime and tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.bleeding) > 30 and not (snd.have_aff("haemophilia") or snd.have_aff("stun")) then snd.clotcheck() snd.clottime = false if reclottimer_timer then killTimer(reclottimer_timer) end reclottimer_timer = tempTimer(1,[[snd.clottime = true]]) end
if #snd.aff_list == 0 then snd.herbaffflag = false snd.salveaffflag = false snd.pipeaffflag = false snd.writheaffflag = false return false end
else cecho("\n<cyan>SYSTEM IS PAUSED, SYSTEM IS PAUSED, USE <red>SNDON<cyan> TO UNPAUSE") if snd.firstaid then snd.send("firstaid off") end end

Trigger.name: def start
Trigger.script: for i in pairs(snd.defenses) do snd.def_remove(i) end snd.parrying = "head"

regexCodeList.string: You have the following active defences:

Trigger.name: def end
Trigger.script: setTriggerStayOpen("def start", 0)

regexCodeList.string: You are protected by
^You are protected by (\d+) defences\.$

Trigger.name: Which endgame skills you got?
Trigger.script:
local possible_skills = { "Selfishness", "Chameleon", "Gripping", "Nightsight", "Stalking", "Heatsight", "Pacing", }
for _, v in pairs(possible_skills) do if string.find(matches[2], v) and not table.isMember(snd.skills.raceskills, v) then table.insert(snd.skills.raceskills, v) end end

Trigger.name: affline got
Trigger.script:
deleteLine() snd.aff_gain(multimatches[2][2]) afftest = multimatches[2][2]
if afftest == "paresis" then if not snd.queuesent and not snd.waiting.queue then send("queue clear") elseif snd.class == "Zealot" then if snd.swagger < 2 then snd.send("qeb swagger") end end end
if snd.have_aff("blackout") and snd.have_aff("recklessness") then enableTimer("recklessblackouttimer") elseif snd.have_aff("blackout") then enableTimer("blackout") elseif snd.have_aff("recklessness") then enableTimer("recklessblackouttimer") end

regexCodeList.string: ANSI_COLORS_F{006}_B{000}
^You are afflicted with (.+)\.$

Trigger.name: affline cure
Trigger.script:
deleteLine() snd.aff_cure(multimatches[2][2])
if multimatches[2][2] == "left_arm_broken" then snd.aff_remove("broken_arm") if snd.limbbrokencount > 0 then snd.limbbrokencount = snd.limbbrokencount - 1 end elseif multimatches[2][2] == "right_arm_broken" then snd.aff_remove("broken_arm") if snd.limbbrokencount > 0 then snd.limbbrokencount = snd.limbbrokencount - 1 end end if multimatches[2][2] == "left_leg_broken" then snd.aff_remove("broken_leg") if snd.limbbrokencount > 0 then snd.limbbrokencount = snd.limbbrokencount - 1 end elseif multimatches[2][2] == "right_leg_broken" then snd.aff_remove("broken_leg") if snd.limbbrokencount > 0 then snd.limbbrokencount = snd.limbbrokencount - 1 end end
local multiaffliction = multimatches[2][2] snd.passfunction = multimatches[2][2]
if not table.isMember(snd.have_aff, multimatches[2][2]) and multimatches[2][2] ~= "stun" and multimatches[2][2] ~= "vitalbane" then snd.unknownquantity = snd.unknownquantity - 1 if tonumber(snd.unknownquantity) < 1 then delitem(snd.afflictions, "unknown") snd.unknownquantity = 0 end snd.aff_remove(snd.passfunction) else snd.aff_remove(snd.passfunction) end
if "grappled" == multiaffliction then snd.statusrecovery = true end
if multiaffliction == "blackout" then snd.healretry = false snd.send("qeb concentrate") if gmcp.Char.Vitals.herb == "1" then snd.herbalance = true else snd.herbalance = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.salve == "1" then snd.salvebal = true else snd.salvebal = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.focus == "1" then snd.focus = true else snd.focus = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.tree == "1" then snd.tree = true else snd.tree = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.pipe == "1" then snd.pipebalance = true else snd.pipebalance = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.renew == "1" then snd.recon = true else snd.recon = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.moss == "1" then snd.moss = true else snd.moss = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.elixir == "1" then snd.healbalance = true else snd.healbalance = false end if snd.sync == true then snd.statusrecovery = true end
elseif multiaffliction == "confusion" then snd.send("qeb concentrate") elseif multiaffliction == "disfigurement" then snd.statusrecovery = true snd.setpassive = true elseif multiaffliction == "asthma" then if gmcp.Char.Vitals.pipe == "1" then snd.pipebalance = true else snd.pipebalance = false end
elseif multiaffliction == "impatience" then if gmcp.Char.Vitals.focus == "1" then snd.focus = true else snd.focus = false end
elseif (multiaffliction == "stupidity" or multiaffliction == "aeon") then if gmcp.Char.Vitals.herb == "1" then snd.herbalance = true else snd.herbalance = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.salve == "1" then snd.salvebal = true else snd.salvebal = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.focus == "1" then snd.focus = true else snd.focus = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.tree == "1" then snd.tree = true else snd.tree = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.pipe == "1" then snd.pipebalance = true else snd.pipebalance = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.renew == "1" then snd.recon = true else snd.recon = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.moss == "1" then snd.moss = true else snd.moss = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.elixir == "1" then snd.healbalance = true else snd.healbalance = false end snd.stunrecheck = false snd.send("qeb concentrate"..snd.sep.."drink health")
elseif multiaffliction == "right_leg_broken" then snd.send("stand") elseif multiaffliction == "left_leg_broken" then snd.send("stand") elseif multiaffliction == "vinethorns" then snd.vinethornpulling = false
end
if snd.sync then snd.statusrecovery = true end

regexCodeList.string: ANSI_COLORS_F{006}_B{000}
^You have cured (.*).$

Trigger.name: arms
Trigger.script: snd.aff_have("broken_arm")

regexCodeList.string: A serpentine blademistress spits onto her scimitar before slicing into you, and your arm wastes away beneath burning venom.
Blood floats up through the water as a blackened, ravenous shark seizes your arm in its maw, nearly tearing it from your body and snapping bones in the process.
The crone strokes your arm, withering it into uselessness.
^Before you can avoid it, \w+'s? hand brushes against your arm and it withers away\.$

Trigger.name: legs
Trigger.script: snd.aff_have("broken_leg")

regexCodeList.string: A tattered Bahkatu experiment tears into your knee with his rabid maw, snapping the bone easily beneath such immense pressure.
A giant, rabid Syll seizes your leg in an iron grip, nearly pulling it clean from the socket.
A chimera's black lion head seizes your leg in its grip, wrenching it painfully from its socket as it tosses you to the ground.
A sharp-toothed gremlin's eyes gleam as it slams its head into your knee, shattering it and knocking you off-balance.
^\w+ reaches out and grabs your leg, which almost gives way underneath you as it shrivels feebly away\.$

Trigger.name: got adder
Trigger.script: snd.aff_have("adder_tarot") --snd.send("qeb rip card from body")

regexCodeList.string: ^\w+ dips the Adder tarot in venom then flings it at you\. It hooks viciously into your? flesh, a small trail of blood dripping from where it pierced the skin\.$

Trigger.name: cure adder
Trigger.script: snd.aff_cure("adder_tarot")

regexCodeList.string: You rip the Adder tarot from your body, the sharp fangs tearing your flesh.

Trigger.name: Pendulum on you
Trigger.script:
local changeleftarm = 0 local changeleftleg = 0 local changerightarm = 0 local changerightleg = 0
if matches[2] == "clockwise" then if snd.limb_damage["right arm"] > 0 then changerightleg = snd.limb_damage["right arm"] elseif snd.limb_damage["right leg"] > 0 then changeleftleg = snd.limb_damage["right leg"] elseif snd.limb_damage["left arm"] > 0 then changerightarm = snd.limb_damage["left arm"] elseif snd.limb_damage["left leg"] > 0 then changeleftarm = snd.limb_damage["left leg"] end if changerightleg > 0 then snd.limb_damage["right leg"] = changerightleg snd.limb_damage["right arm"] = 0 elseif changeleftleg > 0 then snd.limb_damage["left leg"] = changeleftleg snd.limb_damage["right leg"] = 0 elseif changerightarm > 0 then snd.limb_damage["right arm"] = changerightarm snd.limb_damage["left arm"] = 0 elseif changeleftarm > 0 then snd.limb_damage["left arm"] = changeleftarm snd.limb_damage["left leg"] = 0 end elseif matches[2] == "anti-clockwise" then if snd.limb_damage["right arm"] > 0 then changeleftarm = snd.limb_damage["right arm"] elseif snd.limb_damage["right leg"] > 0 then changerightarm = snd.limb_damage["right leg"] elseif snd.limb_damage["left arm"] > 0 then changeleftleg = snd.limb_damage["left arm"] elseif snd.limb_damage["left leg"] > 0 then changerightleg = snd.limb_damage["left leg"] end if changeleftarm > 0 then snd.limb_damage["left arm"] = changeleftarm snd.limb_damage["right arm"] = 0 elseif changerightarm > 0 then snd.limb_damage["right arm"] = changerightarm snd.limb_damage["right leg"] = 0 elseif changeleftleg > 0 then snd.limb_damage["left leg"] = changeleftleg snd.limb_damage["left arm"] = 0 elseif changerightleg > 0 then snd.limb_damage["right leg"] = changerightleg snd.limb_damage["left leg"] = 0 end end

Trigger.name: bracket prompt blackout
Trigger.script:
snd.aff_gain("blackout")
local healthchangeval = 0
if gmcp.Char.Vitals ~= nil then healthchangeval = (tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp) - tonumber(snd.lasthealth)) if not snd.have_aff("blackout") then if tonumber(healthchangeval) ~= "0" then if tonumber(snd.lasthealth) > tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp) then cecho("<red>\[\- " ..healthchangeval.. " \-\]") elseif tonumber(snd.lasthealth) < tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp) then cecho("<cyan>\[\+ " ..healthchangeval.. " +\]") end end end snd.percenthealth = (tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp) / tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) * 100) snd.percenthealth = roundDown(snd.percenthealth,0) snd.percentmana = (tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.mp) / tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxmp) * 100) snd.percentmana = roundDown(snd.percentmana,0) end
enableTimer("blackout")

Trigger.name: Blackout limb attacks
Trigger.script:
snd.limb_damage[multimatches[2][2]] = snd.limb_damage[multimatches[2][2]]+11
local aff = matches[2]
if snd.have_aff("blackout") then if aff == "left arm" then snd.larmhit = snd.larmhit + 1
elseif aff == "right arm" then snd.rarmhit = snd.rarmhit + 1
elseif aff == "right leg" then snd.rleghit = snd.rleghit + 1
elseif aff == "left leg" then snd.lleghit = snd.lleghit + 1 end snd.parry() end

Trigger.name: login
Trigger.script:
sendGMCP([[Core.Supports.Add ["Comm.Channel 1", "IRE.Time 1"] ]]) -- allows us to use GMCP for communication sorting snd.pipes_lit = false send("config separator", false) enableTrigger("Separator Check/Update") send("tattoos", false) send("config affliction_view on", false) send("config simple_diag on", false) send("config pagelength 250", false) send("config grabcorpses on", false) send("config viewtitles off", false) send("config curemsgs default", false) send("config combatmessages on", false) send("config fishnumbers on", false) send("config autodoors on", false) send("Config Ansi ON", false) send("Config mxp on", false) send("config simpletargeting on", false) send("config dialogue on", false) send("config prettynumbers off", false) send("config color deathsight 11 1", false) -- this is if you want deathsight to actually go to the UI window for tracking send("config color shouts 4 6", false) enableTrigger("Hourglass Check Open", false) snd.class = gmcp.Char.Status.class snd.spectype = gmcp.Char.Status.spec snd.city = gmcp.Char.Status.city if snd.city == "Spinesreach" or snd.city == "Bloodloch" then snd.faction = "shadow" elseif snd.city == "Enorian" or snd.city == "Duiran" then snd.faction = "spirit" end if snd.class == "Ascendril" then send("simultaneity") end if snd.class == "Sciomancer" then send("channel shadow") end if snd.class == "Archivist" then send("empower jhako") end
tempTimer(3, [[if snd.gui_loaded then time_update() end]]) tempTimer(5, [[ snd.changeClass(); if snd.skills ~= {} then snd.skills = {} snd.skills.tattoos_on_me = {} snd.skills.raceskills = {} end send("ab")]]) tempTimer(6, [[populate_skills()]]) tempTimer(7, [[send("tattoos", false)]])
tempTimer(8, [[send("raceskill list", false)]])
snd.cohoshtype = "cohosh" snd.salvapplytype = "apply" snd.wheretype = "to" snd.restotype = "restoration" snd.mendingtype = "mending" snd.calorictype = "caloric" snd.epidermaltype = "epidermal" snd.masstype = "mass"
if gmcp.Char.Status.race == "Yeleni" then snd.endgamedef = "warmth" snd.endgamehealth = "serenity" snd.endgameuse = "renew"
elseif gmcp.Char.Status.race == "Azudim" then snd.endgamedef = "miasma" snd.endgamehealth = "shift" snd.endgameuse = "RECONSTITUTE"
elseif gmcp.Char.Status.race == "Tekal" then snd.endgamedef = "none" snd.endgamehealth = "none" snd.endgameuse = "none"
elseif gmcp.Char.Status.race == "Idreth" then snd.endgamedef = "safeguard" snd.endgamehealth = "pulse" snd.endgameuse = "erase"
elseif gmcp.Char.Status.race ~= "Ankyrean" and gmcp.Char.Status.race ~= "Azudim" and gmcp.Char.Status.race ~= "Yeleni" and gmcp.Char.Status.race ~= "Idreth" then snd.endgamedef = "none" snd.endgamehealth = "none" snd.endgameuse = "none" end

Trigger.name: ih aggro

Trigger.name: ih line
Trigger.script:
snd.bashing.target_word = matches[2] snd.bashing.target_number = matches[3] snd.bashing.target_desc = matches[4] for i in ipairs(snd.possible_targets) do if ((snd.bashing.target_type == "long") and string.find(snd.bashing.target_desc, snd.possible_targets[i])) or ((snd.bashing.target_type == "short") and string.find(snd.bashing.target_word, snd.possible_targets[i])) then if not string.find(snd.bashing.target_desc, "the corpse of") then if not snd.bashing.targeted then if snd.toggles.generics then snd.bashing.target = snd.bashing.target_word else snd.bashing.target = snd.bashing.target_number end if snd.toggles.calling then snd.send("wt target: "..snd.bashing.target) end snd.bashing.targeted = true snd.bashing.target_priority = i elseif i < snd.bashing.target_priority then if snd.toggles.generics then snd.bashing.target = snd.bashing.target_word else snd.bashing.target = snd.bashing.target_number end if snd.toggles.calling then snd.send("wt target: "..snd.bashing.target) end snd.bashing.target_priority = i snd.bashing.targeted = true end end end end
if snd.possible_items ~= {} then for k in ipairs(snd.possible_items) do if string.find(snd.bashing.target_desc, snd.possible_items[k]) then snd.item_found = false for v in ipairs(snd.gathering) do if snd.gathering[v] == snd.bashing.target_number then snd.item_found = true end end if not snd.item_found then table.insert(snd.gathering, snd.bashing.target_number) end end end end
for y in ipairs(snd.global_items) do if string.find(snd.bashing.target_desc, snd.global_items[y]) then snd.item_found = false for z in ipairs(snd.gathering) do if snd.gathering[z] == snd.bashing.target_number then snd.item_found = true end end if not snd.item_found then table.insert(snd.gathering, snd.bashing.target_number) end end end

Trigger.name: generic capture
Trigger.script:
local secondary_capture_needed = {"A needling horncall airs a whining note, prefacing some grand announcement."} local ignores = {"The shrunken head in your inventory sneezes violently",}
if snd.gui_loaded then
for _, ignore in ipairs(ignores) do if matches[1]:find(ignore) then return false end end
if snd.last_channel == "Web" then if matches[1]:find("Web") then demonnic.chat:append("Web") disableTrigger("generic capture") end elseif string.find(matches[1]:lower(), snd.who_is_talking:lower()) or snd.who_is_talking == gmcp.Char.Status.name then demonnic.chat:append(snd.last_channel or "Misc") disableTrigger("generic capture") elseif snd.we_saw_a_thot then demonnic.chat:append("Local") snd.we_saw_a_thot = false disableTrigger("generic capture") elseif snd.last_channel == "Tells" then demonnic.chat:append("Tells") disableTrigger("generic capture") end
end
if table.isMember(secondary_capture_needed, matches[1]) then enableTrigger("secondary capture") end

Trigger.name: secondary capture
Trigger.script:
if snd.gui_loaded then demonnic.chat:append(snd.last_channel or "Misc") end
disableTrigger("secondary capture")

Trigger.name: Thought trigger
Trigger.script: if snd.gui_loaded then demonnic.chat:append("Local") snd.last_channel = "Local" snd.we_saw_a_thot = true enableTrigger("generic capture") end

Trigger.name: Def strips
Trigger.script:
local strip = matches[3]
if matches[3] ~= "shield" and matches[2] == snd.target then snd.used.rebounding = false
elseif strip == "cloak" then if snd.toggles.calling then snd.send("wt "..snd.target.." cloak is stripped.") end end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+)'s (\w+) defence has been stripped.$

Trigger.name: Teradrim Strips
Trigger.script:
local strip = matches[3]
if matches[2] == snd.target then if strip == "rebounding" then snd.used.rebounding = false snd.waiting.queue = false elseif strip == "shield" then snd.used.shield = false snd.waiting.queue = false elseif strip == "cloak" then snd.used.rebounding = false snd.used.shield = false if snd.toggles.calling then snd.send("wt "..snd.target.." cloak is stripped.") end snd.waiting.queue = false elseif strip ~= "cloak" or strip ~= "rebounding" or strip ~= "shield" then snd.used.rebounding = false snd.used.shield = false snd.waiting.queue = false end end

Trigger.name: resisted venom

Trigger.name: Soothing
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == snd.target then if snd.toggles.atkecho then deleteLine() snd.message(matches[2] .. ": soothing " .. matches[3]) end if snd.checkAff("whiplash") and matches[4] == "head" then snd.target_cured("whiplash") elseif snd.checkAff("backstrain") and matches[4] == "torso" then snd.target_cured("backsrain") elseif snd.checkAff("muscle spasms") and matches[4] == "torso" then snd.target_cured("muscle spasms") elseif snd.checkAff("stiffness") then snd.target_cured("stiffness") elseif snd.checkAff("sore wrist") and matches[4]:find("arm") then snd.target_cured("sore wrist") elseif snd.checkAff("weak grip") then snd.target_cured("weak grip") elseif snd.checkAff("sore ankle") and matches[4]:find("leg") then snd.target_cured("sore ankle") end end

Trigger.name: Blitz
Trigger.script:
local basic_limb_affs = { ["left leg"] = "a broken left leg", ["right leg"] = "a broken right leg", ["left arm"] = "a broken left arm", ["right arm"] = "a broken right arm", }
if matches[2] == snd.target then snd.target_got(basic_limb_affs[matches[3]]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^ (\w+)\'s (.+) twists and breaks under the blow.$

Trigger.name: Palmforce
Trigger.script: if multimatches[1][3] == snd.target then snd.target_prone = true end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) uses? Zeal Palmforce on (\w+).$
^The generated force knocks (the )?\w+ to the floor.$

Trigger.name: Chain attacks
Trigger.script:
if matches[4] == snd.target then if matches[3] == "Anklepin" then snd.target_got("sore ankle") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "sore ankle") end
if matches[3] == "Jawcrack" then snd.target_got("stuttering") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "stuttering") snd.target_got("blurry vision") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "blurry vision") end
if matches[3] == "Descent" then snd.target_got("backstrain") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "backstrain") end
if matches[3] == "Wristlash" then snd.target_got("sore wrist") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "sore wrist") end
if matches[3] == "Uprise" then snd.target_got("whiplash") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "whiplash") end end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) uses? Zeal (\w+) on (\w+).$

Trigger.name: Zealot indifference
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == snd.target then snd.target_got("indifference") end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+)'s eyelids droop as .+ expression turns lax.$

Trigger.name: Purification Scorch
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == snd.target then snd.target_got("ablaze") end

regexCodeList.string: ^\w+ uses? Purification Scorch on (\w+)\.$

Trigger.name: Scorch fails
Trigger.script: snd.target_cured("ablaze")

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+)'s shield of flame repels the fiery attack.$

Trigger.name: Purification Heatspear
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == snd.target then snd.target_got("heatspear") end

regexCodeList.string: ^\w+ uses? Purification Heatspear on (\w+)\.$

Trigger.name: Wrath - Parry watching
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == snd.target then snd.parried_limb = matches[4] end

regexCodeList.string: ^You see (\w+) shift .+ parry to (his|her|their|its) (.+)\.$

Trigger.name: Zealot farsee
Trigger.script: mmp.locateAndEcho(matches[2])

regexCodeList.string: ^The hazy scenery of (.+) fills the space briefly before fading away\.$

Trigger.name: No Flames
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == snd.target then if snd.checkAff("ablaze") then snd.target_cured("ablaze") end end

regexCodeList.string: ^There are no flames around (\w+)\.$

Trigger.name: Flames Basic
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == snd.target then snd.target_got("ablaze") end

regexCodeList.string: Flames leap around (\w+), charring (his|her) flesh.

Trigger.name: Infernal Seal
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == snd.target then snd.target_got("infernal_seal") tempTimer(125, [[snd.target_cured("infernal_seal")]]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^\w+ uses? Purification Infernal on (\w+).$
^(\w+) is already suffering under an Infernal Seal.$

Trigger.name: broke
Trigger.script:
deleteLine() snd.message("<red>Broke: <white>"..matches[2]..matches[3].." "..matches[4]) if matches[2] == snd.target then snd.limb_status[matches[4]] = "broken"
if matches[2] == snd.target and matches[4]~= "head" and matches[4] ~= "torso" then snd.target_got("a broken "..matches[4]) end end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+)('s|') (.+) breaks from all the damage\.$

Trigger.name: mangled
Trigger.script: deleteLine() snd.message("<red>Mangled: <white>"..matches[2]..matches[3].." "..matches[4]) if matches[2] == snd.target then snd.last_hit_limb = matches[4] snd.last_limb_dmg = 66.66-snd.limb_dmg[matches[4]] snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, snd.last_limb_dmg) snd.limb_status[matches[4]] = "mangled" end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+)('s|') (.+) has been beaten into uselessness\.$

Trigger.name: mending
Trigger.script: if matches[2]:lower() == snd.target:lower() then if not snd.checkAff("burnt_skin") then if snd.limb_bruising[matches[4]] >= 3 then snd.limb_bruising[matches[4]] = snd.limb_bruising[matches[4]]-1 elseif snd.checkAff("destroyed_throat") then snd.target_cured("destroyed_throat") elseif snd.checkAff("crippled throat") and matches[4] == "head" then snd.target_cured("crippled throat") elseif snd.checkAff("lightwound") and matches[4] == "torso" then snd.target_cured("lightwound") elseif snd.checkAff("ablaze") and not snd.checkAff("heatspear") and (matches[4] == "torso" or matches[4] == "skin") then snd.target_cured("ablaze") snd.target_cured("crispy") elseif snd.checkAff("a broken "..matches[4]) then snd.target_cured("a broken "..matches[4]) elseif snd.checkAff("a broken arm") and matches[4]:find("arm") then snd.target_cured("a broken arm") elseif snd.checkAff("a broken leg") and matches[4]:find ("leg") then snd.target_cured("a broken leg") elseif matches[3] == "torso" and snd.checkAff("cracked_ribs") then snd.target_cured("cracked ribs") elseif snd.limb_bruising[matches[4]] > 0 then snd.limb_bruising[matches[4]] = snd.limb_bruising[matches[4]]-1 elseif snd.checkAff(matches[4].." dislocated") then snd.target_cured(matches[4].." dislocated") end end elseif snd.toggles.nontargetgags then deleteFull() end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) presses a mending poultice against (the )?\w+ (head|torso|right leg|left leg|right arm|left arm), rubbing the poultice into (the )?\w+ flesh\.$

Trigger.name: restoration
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == snd.target then snd.resto_limb = matches[4] snd.enemy_used_regenerate = false if restoration_timer then killTimer(restoration_timer) end snd.current_restoration_aff = "" local aff_restoration_timer = true
if snd.resto_limb == "torso" then if snd.checkAff("collapsed_lung") then snd.current_restoration_aff = "collapsed_lung" elseif snd.checkAff("spinal_rip") then snd.current_restoration_aff = "spinal_rip" elseif snd.checkAff("burnt_skin") then snd.current_restoration_aff = "burnt_skin" elseif snd.checkAff("crushed_chest") and snd.limb_status["torso"] == "healed" then snd.current_restoration_aff = "crushed_chest" elseif snd.checkAff("heatspear") and snd.limb_status["torso"] == "healed" then snd.current_restoration_aff = "heatspear" elseif snd.checkAff("deepwound") and snd.limb_status["torso"] == "healed" then snd.current_restoration_aff = "deepwound" else aff_restoration_timer = false restoration_timer = tempTimer(3.8, [[if snd.enemy_used_regenerate == true then snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.resto_limb, -40) else snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.resto_limb, -30) end ]]) end elseif snd.resto_limb == "head" then if snd.checkAff("mauled_face") then snd.current_restoration_aff = "mauled_face" elseif snd.checkAff("smashed_throat") and snd.limb_status["head"] == "healed" then snd.current_restoration_aff = "smashed_throat" elseif snd.checkAff("voidgaze") and snd.limb_status["head"] == "healed" then snd.current_restoration_aff = "voidgaze" else aff_restoration_timer = false restoration_timer = tempTimer(3.8, [[if snd.enemy_used_regenerate == true then snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.resto_limb, -40) else snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.resto_limb, -30) end ]]) end --All limbs don't have special resto affs, so just remove the damage accrued. else aff_restoration_timer = false restoration_timer = tempTimer(3.8, [[if snd.enemy_used_regenerate == true then snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.resto_limb, -40) else snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.resto_limb, -30) end ]]) end
if aff_restoration_timer then restoration_timer = tempTimer(3.8,[[snd.target_cured(snd.current_restoration_aff)]]) end snd.enemy_restoration_balance = false tempTimer(3,[[snd.enemy_restoration_balance = true]])
end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) presses a restoration poultice against (the )?\w+ (head|torso|right leg|left leg|right arm|left arm), rubbing the poultice into (the )?\w+ flesh\.$

Trigger.name: Prone w/leg breaks
Trigger.script: deleteLine() snd.message("<red>Broke: <white>"..matches[2]..matches[3].." "..matches[4]) if matches[2] == snd.target then snd.limb_status[matches[4]] = "broken" snd.target_prone = true end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+)'s legs give way as (the )?\w+ (.+) breaks.$

Trigger.name: Survival restore
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == snd.target then if snd.checkAff("a broken right arm") and not snd.checkAff("right arm damaged") then snd.target_cured("a broken right arm") elseif snd.checkAff("a broken left arm") and not snd.checkAff("left arm damaged") then snd.target_cured("a broken left arm") elseif snd.checkAff("a broken left leg") and not snd.checkAff("left leg damaged") then snd.target_cured("a broken left leg") elseif snd.checkAff("a broken right leg") and not snd.checkAff("right leg damaged") then snd.target_cured("a broken right leg") end end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) crackles with blue energy that wreathes itself about (the )?\w+ limbs.$

Trigger.name: 3P limb breaks from random sources
Trigger.script:
local basic_limb_affs = { ["left leg"] = "a broken left leg", ["right leg"] = "a broken right leg", ["left arm"] = "a broken left arm", ["right arm"] = "a broken right arm", }
if matches[2] == snd.target then snd.target_got(basic_limb_affs[matches[3]]) end

regexCodeList.string: ^The crone withers (\w+)'s (.*) into uselessness.$
^A .* golem reaches out and seizes (\w+)'s (.*) in its powerful grip, pulling and twisting until the bone snaps.$
^\w+ reaches out to grab (\w+)'s (.*), and it shrivels away.$
^You hear the sharp snap of bone as (the )?\w+ rends (\w+)'s (.*).$
^You find that (\w+)'s (.*) is already shriveled.$
^You quickly adjust the momentum of your flail, smashing it into (\w+)'s (.*).$

Trigger.name: cold hit
Trigger.script: if snd.toggles.atkecho then deleteLine() snd.message("Chilled: "..matches[2]..".") end if matches[2] == snd.target then snd.target_got("cold") end

regexCodeList.string: ^You use Bladefire Iceblast \(one\-hand\) on (\w+)\.$
^Frost forms upon a blackened warhammer and spreads to (\w+)\.$
^At .+ command, .+ howls with frosty breath, chilling (\w+)('s|') wounds\.$
^.+ opens its maw wide before breathing forth a stream of freezing air towards (\w+)\.$
^\w+ uses? Woodlore Icebreath on (\w+)\.$

Trigger.name: bruising
Trigger.script: if matches[3] == snd.target then local bruise = matches[2] local limb = matches[4] deleteLine() snd.message("<white>Bruising on "..limb..": <red>"..string.upper(matches[2])) if bruise == "light" then snd.limb_bruising[limb] = 1 elseif bruise == "moderate" then snd.limb_bruising[limb] = 2 elseif bruise == "critical" then snd.limb_bruising[limb] = 3 end end

regexCodeList.string: ^Your strikes cause (\w+) bruising on (\w+)'s (.*).$

Trigger.name: Enemy Regenerate
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == snd.target then snd.enemy_used_regenerate = true end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) becomes flushed as .+ heals with quickened haste.$

Trigger.name: Sand shred
Trigger.script: if matches[3] == snd.target then snd.last_hit_limb = matches[2]:gsub(" storm", "") snd.last_limb_dmg = 6.99 snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, snd.last_limb_dmg) end

regexCodeList.string: ^\w+ uses? Desiccation Shred \((.+)\) on (\w+)\.$

Trigger.name: sand shred finished
Trigger.script: setTriggerStayOpen("Sand shred", 0)

regexCodeList.string: return isPrompt()

Trigger.name: undo sand shred
Trigger.script: snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, -snd.last_limb_dmg)

regexCodeList.string: ^The attack rebounds back onto (\w+)\!$
^Stepping quickly out of the way, (\w+) dodges the attack\.$
^(\w+) parries the attack on (.*) with a deft maneuver\.$
^(\w+) guards the attack on (.*)\.$
^A reflection of (\w+) blinks out of existence\.$
^With a free hand, (\w+) fends off the attack on (the )?\w+ (.+)\.$
^(.+) steps into the attack on (the )?\w+ (.+), grabs your arm and twists it.$
^(.*) steps into the attack on (the )?\w+ (.*), grabs your arm, and shakes you violently\.$
^(\w+) jerks to the side, the attack barely grazing (.*).$

Trigger.name: gutsmash

regexCodeList.string: ^\w+ uses? Terramancy Gutsmash on (\w+)\.$

regexCodeList.string: return isPrompt()

snd.target_got(basic_limb_affs[matches[2]])

Trigger.name: ferality
Trigger.script: snd.last_limb_dmg = 0 snd.last_hit_limb = "none" if multimatches[1][4] == snd.target then snd.last_aff = "nothing" if multimatches[1][2] == "Slash" then snd.last_limb_dmg = 7.49 elseif multimatches[1][2] == "Bite" then snd.last_limb_dmg = 8.99 elseif multimatches[1][2] == "Hamstring" then snd.last_limb_dmg = 5.72 if not snd.checkAff("a broken "..multimatches[1][3]) then snd.target_got("a broken "..multimatches[1][3]) snd.last_aff = "a broken "..multimatches[1][3] snd.limb_status[multimatches[1][3]] = "broken" end elseif multimatches[1][2] == "Rend" then snd.last_limb_dmg = 5.72 if not snd.checkAff("a broken "..multimatches[1][3]) then snd.target_got("a broken "..multimatches[1][3]) snd.last_aff = "a broken "..multimatches[1][3] snd.limb_status[multimatches[1][3]] = "broken" end elseif multimatches[1][2] == "Mangle" then if not snd.checkAff("a broken "..multimatches[1][3]) then snd.target_got("a broken "..multimatches[1][3]) snd.last_aff = "a broken "..multimatches[1][3] snd.limb_status[multimatches[1][3]] = "damaged" end elseif multimatches[1][2] == "Destroy" then if not snd.checkAff("a broken "..multimatches[1][3]) then snd.target_got("a broken "..multimatches[1][3]) snd.last_aff = "a broken "..multimatches[1][3] snd.limb_status[multimatches[1][3]] = "mangled" snd.target_prone = true end end snd.last_hit_limb = multimatches[1][3] snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, snd.last_limb_dmg) end

Trigger.script: snd.last_limb_dmg = 0 snd.last_hit_limb = "none" if multimatches[1][3] == snd.target then hitting = true snd.last_aff = "nothing" if multimatches[1][2] == "Bodypunch" then snd.last_limb_dmg = 7 snd.last_hit_limb = "torso" snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, snd.last_limb_dmg) elseif multimatches[1][2] == "Skullwhack" or multimatches[1][2] == "Jugular" then snd.last_limb_dmg = 7.49 snd.last_hit_limb = "head" snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, snd.last_limb_dmg) elseif multimatches[1][2] == "Facemaul" then snd.last_limb_dmg = 14.2 snd.last_hit_limb = "head" elseif multimatches[1][2] == "Faceslash" then snd.last_limb_dmg = 7.49 snd.last_hit_limb = "head" snd.target_got("blurry vision") snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, snd.last_limb_dmg) snd.target_got("mauled_face") elseif multimatches[1][2] == "Throatslice" then snd.last_limb_dmg = 7.15 snd.last_hit_limb = "head" snd.target_got("crippled_throat") elseif multimatches[1][2] == "Gut" then snd.last_limb_dmg = 33.67 snd.last_hit_limb = "torso" if not snd.checkAff("a broken torso") then snd.target_got("a broken torso") snd.last_aff = "a broken torso" end elseif multimatches[1][2] == "Lacerate" then snd.last_limb_dmg = 12 snd.last_hit_limb = "torso" snd.target_got("rend") snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, snd.last_limb_dmg) elseif multimatches[1][2] == "Spinalcrack" then -- Gives paresis snd.last_limb_dmg = 10 snd.last_hit_limb = "torso" snd.target_got("paresis") snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, snd.last_limb_dmg) elseif multimatches[1][2] == "Leapslash" then snd.target_prone = true snd.target_got("prone") elseif multimatches[1][2] == "Spinalrip" then snd.target_got("spinal_rip") end snd.last_hit_limb = multimatches[1][3] snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, snd.last_limb_dmg) end

Trigger.name: 3P Locks, Rips & Ruptures & Leapslash
Trigger.script: local FAttack = matches[2] if matches[3] == snd.target then if FAttack == "Groinrip" then snd.target_cured("thighlock") snd.target_got("groinrip") elseif FAttack == "Spleenrip" then snd.target_cured("armpitlock") snd.target_got("spleenrip") elseif FAttack == "Throatrip" then snd.target_cured("necklock") snd.target_got("throatrip") elseif FAttack == "Rupture" or FAttack == "Buffet" or FAttack == "Deathroll" or FAttack == "Gore" or FAttack == "Headdrop" then if IhaveJawlockThroat then snd.target_cured("armpitlock") snd.target_cured("thighlock") elseif IhaveJawlockArmpit then snd.target_cured("thighlock") snd.target_cured("necklock") elseif IhaveJawlockGroin then snd.target_cured("armpitlock") snd.target_cured("necklock") else snd.target_cured("armpitlock") snd.target_cured("necklock") snd.target_cured("thighlock") end elseif FAttack == "Necklock" then snd.target_got("necklock") elseif FAttack == "Armpitlock" then snd.target_got("armpitlock") elseif FAttack == "Thighlock" then snd.target_got("thighlock") elseif FAttack == "Leapslash" then snd.target_got("prone") end end

Trigger.name: dhuriv attack
Trigger.script:
snd.last_aff = "" snd.last_affs = {} if snd.toggles.atkecho then deleteLine() if multimatches[1][4] == "you" then snd.got_hit(string.lower(multimatches[1][3]), multimatches[1][2]) elseif not multimatches[1][1] == "you" then snd.third_hit(string.lower(multimatches[1][3]), multimatches[1][2], multimatches[1][4]) end end if multimatches[1][4] == snd.target then if multimatches[1][3] == "Heartbreaker" then snd.target_got("heartflutter") snd.last_aff = "heartflutter" elseif multimatches[1][3] == "Twirl" then snd.target_got("confusion") snd.last_aff = "confusion" elseif multimatches[1][3] == "Weaken" then snd.target_got("lethargy") snd.last_aff = "lethargy" elseif multimatches[1][3] == "Reave" then snd.used.rebounding = false elseif multimatches[1][3] == "Trip" then snd.target_prone = true elseif multimatches[1][3] == "Crosscut" then snd.target_got("impairment") snd.last_aff = "impairment" elseif multimatches[1][3] == "Throatcrush" then snd.target_got("destroyed_throat") snd.last_aff = "destroyed_throat" elseif multimatches[1][3] == "Gouge" then snd.target_got("impatience") snd.last_aff = "impatience" elseif multimatches[1][3] == "Slam" then if not table.contains(snd.target_has, "epilepsy") then if not table.contains(snd.target_has, "laxity") then snd.target_got("epilepsy") snd.target_got("laxity") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "laxity") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "epilepsy") else snd.target_got("epilepsy") snd.last_aff = ("epilepsy") end elseif not table.contains(snd.target_has, "laxity") then snd.target_got("laxity") snd.last_aff = ("laxity") end elseif multimatches[1][3] == "Blind" then if snd.checkAff("sight") then snd.target_got("blurry vision") snd.last_aff = "blurry vision" else snd.target_got("sight") snd.last_aff = "sight" end elseif multimatches[1][3] == "Slash" or multimatches[1][3] == "Stab" or multimatches[1][3] == "Thrust" or multimatches[1][3] == "Flourish" or multimatches[1][3] == "Slice" then
local aff = "" if #snd.maybe_affs >= 1 then aff = snd.venomEffect(snd.maybe_affs[1]) if aff ~= "" then snd.target_got(aff) snd.last_aff = aff table.remove(snd.maybe_affs, 1) end end end end

Trigger.name: Tenacity attacks
Trigger.script:
snd.last_aff = "" snd.last_affs = {} if snd.toggles.atkecho then deleteLine() if multimatches[1][4] == "you" then snd.got_hit(string.lower(multimatches[1][3]), multimatches[1][2]) else snd.third_hit(string.lower(multimatches[1][3]), multimatches[1][2], multimatches[1][4]) end end if multimatches[1][4] == snd.target then if multimatches[1][3] == "Bash" then if snd.checkAff("hearing") then snd.target_got("dizziness") snd.last_aff = "dizziness" else snd.target_got("hearing") snd.last_aff = "hearing" end snd.last_hit_limb = "head" snd.last_limb_dmg = 9 snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, snd.last_limb_dmg) elseif multimatches[1][3] == "Slaughter" then if #snd.maybe_affs >= 1 then aff = "" for i in pairs(snd.effects) do if snd.effects[i] == snd.maybe_affs[1] then aff = i end end if aff ~= "" then snd.target_got(aff) table.remove(snd.maybe_affs, 1) end end if #snd.maybe_affs >= 1 then aff = "" for i in pairs(snd.effects) do if snd.effects[i] == snd.maybe_affs[1] then aff = i end end if aff ~= "" then snd.target_got(aff) table.remove(snd.maybe_affs, 1) end end elseif multimatches[1][3] == "Lacerate" then if not snd.checkAff("haemophilia") then snd.target_got("haemophilia") snd.last_aff = "haemophilia" end elseif multimatches[1][3] == "Carve" then if not snd.checkAff("vomiting") then snd.target_got("vomiting") snd.last_aff = "vomiting" end snd.last_hit_limb = "torso" snd.last_limb_dmg = 13 snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, snd.last_limb_dmg) elseif multimatches[1][3] == "Lob" or multimatches[1][3] == "Chop" or multimatches[1][3] == "Assault" or multimatches[1][3] == "Cripple" then if #snd.maybe_affs >= 1 then aff = "" for i in pairs(snd.effects) do if snd.effects[i] == snd.maybe_affs[1] then aff = i end -- end if 59 end -- end for 58 if aff ~= "" then snd.target_got(aff) table.remove(snd.maybe_affs, 1) end end-- end if 56 --limb damage portion here local limb_damage_amounts = { ["Chop"] = 8, ["Assault"] = 3.99, ["Cripple"] = 4.99,} local limb_table = {"right leg", "left leg", "left arm", "right arm", "head", "torso",} -- viable limb targets for k, v in pairs(limb_table) do -- loop viable targets if multimatches[3][1]:find(v) then -- find which limb is being hit snd.last_hit_limb = v end end snd.last_limb_dmg = limb_damage_amounts[multimatches[1][3]] if snd.checkAff("assault_damage") then snd.last_limb_dmg = snd.last_limb_dmg + 3 end snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, snd.last_limb_dmg ) if multimatches[1][3] == "Assault" then snd.target_got("assault_damage") tempTimer(2, [[snd.target_cured("assault_damage")]]) end
end end

Trigger.name: Flare
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == snd.target then if snd.glimpse == "air" then if snd.checkAff("vertigo") then snd.target_got("muddled") else snd.target_got("vertigo") end end
if snd.glimpse == "water" then if snd.checkAff("hypothermia") then if not snd.checkAff("no_caloric") then snd.target_got("no_caloric") elseif snd.checkAff("no_caloric") and not snd.checkAff("shivering") then snd.target_got("shivering") elseif snd.checkAff("shivering") and not snd.checkAff("frozen") then snd.target_got("frozen") end else snd.target_got("hypothermia") end end
if snd.glimpse == "fire" then snd.target_got("ablaze") end end

regexCodeList.string: ^You use Thaumaturgy Flare on (\w+).$

Trigger.name: Ruin Shadowprice Combined
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == snd.target then local aff_count = 0 if not snd.checkAff("clumsiness") then snd.target_got("clumsiness") aff_count = 1 end if not snd.checkAff("weariness") then snd.target_got("weariness") aff_count = aff_count + 1 end if not snd.checkAff("lethargy") and aff_count < 2 then snd.target_got("lethargy") aff_count = aff_count + 1 end if not snd.checkAff("paresis") and aff_count < 2 then snd.target_got("paresis") end end

regexCodeList.string: ^\w+ uses? Sciomancy Shadowprice Ruin on (\w+).$

Trigger.name: Scourge Combined
Trigger.script:

end

Trigger.name: Erupt
Trigger.script:
if matches[3] == snd.target then snd.last_hit_limb = matches[2] if snd.gravity == 0 then snd.last_limb_dmg = 4 elseif snd.gravity == 1 then snd.last_limb_dmg = 8 elseif snd.gravity == 2 then snd.last_limb_dmg = 13 elseif snd.gravity == 3 then snd.last_limb_dmg = 19 elseif snd.gravity == 4 then snd.last_limb_dmg = 25 elseif snd.gravity == 5 then snd.last_limb_dmg = 33 end
snd.took_limb_dmg(matches[2], snd.last_limb_dmg) snd.gravity = 0
end if snd.class == "Sciomancer" then snd.message("<red>Gravity Total: <white>"..snd.gravity) end

Trigger.name: Tekura Limb Damage Tracking
Trigger.script:
if matches[3] == snd.target then
kicks = { side = false, snapLeft = false, snapRight = false, moonLeft = false, moonRight = false, axe = false, wwk = false } punches = { hook = false, ucp = false, hamemerLeft = false, hammerRight = false, spearLeft = false, spearRight = false, jab = false } snapKick = false moonKick = false whirlwind = false axeKick = false hammerFist = false jabPunch = false hookPunch = false uppercut = false
if matches[2] == "Snapkick" then snapKick = true elseif matches[2] == "Cometkick" then cometKick = true elseif matches[2] == "Moonkick" then moonKick = true elseif matches[2] == "Whirlwind" then whirlwind = true elseif matches[2] == "Sidekick" then sideKick = true elseif matches[2] == "Axe" then axeKick = true elseif matches[2] == "Spear" then spearPunch = true elseif matches[2] == "Hammerfist" then hammerFist = true elseif matches[2] == "Jab" then jabPunch = true elseif matches[2] == "Hook" then hookPunch = true elseif matches[2] == "Uppercut" then uppercut = true end
end

regexCodeList.string: ^\w+ uses Tekura (.+) on (.+)\.$

Trigger.name: Connecting
Trigger.script: if snapKick and matches[2] == "left leg" then kicks.snapLeft = true elseif snapKick and matches[2] == "right leg" then kicks.snapRight = true elseif moonKick and matches[2] == "left arm" then kicks.moonLeft = true elseif moonKick and matches[2] == "right arm" then kicks.moonRight = true elseif whirlwind and matches[2] == "head" then kicks.wwk = true elseif sideKick and matches[2] == "torso" then kicks.side = true elseif axeKick and matches[2] == "head" then kicks.axe = true elseif spearPunch and matches[2] == "left arm" then punches.spearLeft = true elseif spearPunch and matches[2] == "right arm" then punches.spearRight = true elseif hammerFist and matches[2] == "left leg" then punches.hammerLeft = true elseif hammerFist and matches[2] == "right leg" then punches.hammerRight = true elseif jabPunch then if snd.stance == "tiger" then snd.last_hit_limb = matches[2] snd.last_limb_dmg = 6.6 snd.took_limb_dmg(matches[2], snd.last_limb_dmg) else snd.last_hit_limb = matches[2] snd.last_limb_dmg = 5.49 snd.took_limb_dmg(matches[2], snd.last_limb_dmg) end elseif hookPunch and matches[2] == "torso" then punches.hook = true elseif uppercut and matches[2] == "head" then punches.ucp = true elseif cometKick and matches[2] == "torso" then snd.target_got("collapsed_lung") --tempTimer(55, [[snd.target_cured("numb_arms")]]) end monkLimbDamageTracking()

regexCodeList.string: You connect to the (.+)!

Trigger.name: Tekura Attack Finished
Trigger.script: if kicks.snapLeft then monkLimbDamageTracking() elseif kicks.snapRight then monkLimbDamageTracking() elseif kicks.moonLeft then monkLimbDamageTracking() elseif kicks.moonRight then monkLimbDamageTracking() elseif kicks.wwk then monkLimbDamageTracking() elseif kicks.side then monkLimbDamageTracking() elseif kicks.axe then monkLimbDamageTracking() elseif cometKick then snd.target_got("collapsed_lung") --tempTimer(55, [[snd.target_cured("numb_arms")]]) end setTriggerStayOpen("Tekura Limb Damage Tracking", 0) monkLimbDamageTracking()

regexCodeList.string: return isPrompt()

Trigger.name: Wrenching other things
Trigger.script:

Trigger.name: got hit
Trigger.script:
if snd.toggles.attacking then skill = multimatches[2][3] found_set = "none" for set in pairs(snd.cureset_skills) do if table.contains(snd.cureset_skills[set], skill) then found_set = set cecho("
"..found_set) end end if snd.class_hitting == "none" then --haven't seen anyone hit yet if found_set == "none" then --skill isn't in class list echo("
No curing set.") elseif found_set == "archivist" then snd.firstaidassArchivist = true snd.class_hitting = found_set --note what class is hitting snd.send("qeb dodge upset") echo("
Curing set flagged Archivist.") elseif found_set == "indorani" then snd.firstaidassIndorani = true snd.class_hitting = found_set --note what class is hitting snd.send("qeb dodge upset") echo("
Curing set flagged Indorani.") elseif found_set == "luminary" then snd.firstaidassLuminary = true snd.class_hitting = found_set --note what class is hitting echo("
Curing set flagged Luminary.") elseif found_set == "zealot" then snd.firstaidassZealot = true snd.class_hitting = found_set --note what class is hitting echo("
Curing set flagged Zealot.") elseif found_set == "sentinel" then snd.firstaidassSentinel = true snd.class_hitting = found_set --note what class is hitting echo("
Curing set flagged Sentinel.") elseif found_set == "ascendril" then snd.firstaidassAscendril = true snd.class_hitting = found_set --note what class is hitting echo("
Curing set flagged Ascendril.") elseif found_set == "monk" then snd.firstaidassMonk = true snd.class_hitting = found_set --note what class is hitting echo("
Curing set flagged Monk.") snd.send("qeb rebuke left leg") end elseif snd.class_hitting ~= found_set then --this is a secondary class hitting snd.class_hitting = found_set end snd.person_hitting = multimatches[2][2] end
if not table.contains(snd.people_hitting_me, multimatches[2][2]) then table.insert(snd.people_hitting_me, multimatches[2][2]) tempTimer(4, [[table.remove(snd.people_hitting_me, 1)]]) end

Trigger.script:
local who = matches[2]:title()
local count = 1
if table.contains(snd.targeting.list, who) then local pos = table.index_of(snd.targeting.list, who) or nil for k, v in ipairs(snd.targeting.list) do if table.contains(snd.players_here, who) and table.contains(snd.players_here, v) and k > table.index_of(snd.targeting.list, who) then expandAlias("t " .. v) break end end else table.remove(snd.players_here, table.index_of(snd.players_here, who)) snd.get_new_target() end

Trigger.name: Fishing Line Prompt (for deciding to cut/lead/reel)
Trigger.script:
if currently_fishing and fish_update then
fish_update = false
local linestrength = matches[2] local fishstrength = matches[3] local distance = matches[4]
if tonumber(linestrength) >= 90 and tonumber(distance) >= 12 then send("qeb fishing cut") elseif tonumber(linestrength) >= 80 and tonumber(distance) >= 35 then send("qeb fishing cut") elseif tonumber(fishstrength) >= 20 then send("qeb fishing lead", false) elseif tonumber(linestrength) <= 100 then send("qeb fishing reel", false)
end
end

Trigger.name: CaptureFishingHole
Trigger.script:
-- Make sure tables actually exist. if not fishing_holes then load_fishing_db() end
fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]] = fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]] or {}
-- Get some basic data. fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].name = multimatches[1][2] fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].type = multimatches[2][2]
-- Track the room. fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].rooms = fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].rooms or {} local found_room = false for k,v in pairs(fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].rooms) do if v == gmcp.Room.Info.num then found_room = true break end end if not found_room then table.insert(fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].rooms, gmcp.Room.Info.num) end
-- Format the fishing hole contents string so that it can be parsed. multimatches[2][3] = "|" .. multimatches[2][3]:gsub(", ", "||") .. "|" multimatches[2][3] = multimatches[2][3]:gsub(" and ", "||") multimatches[2][3] = multimatches[2][3]:gsub("%|and ", "||") multimatches[2][3] = multimatches[2][3]:gsub("%|%|%|", "||")
-- Iterate over the fishing hole contents and get the fish in the hole. local temp_fish = {} for ftype in multimatches[2][3]:gmatch("%|%d+ of ([%w%s%'%-]+)%|") do table.insert(temp_fish, ftype) end for ftype in multimatches[2][3]:gmatch("%|([%w%s%'%-]+)%|") do local skip = false for tmp in ftype:gmatch("%d of ") do skip = true break end if not skip then table.insert(temp_fish, ftype) end end
-- Make sure our fishing table exists before checking it in the following loop. fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].fish = fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].fish or {} for k, v in pairs(fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].fish) do if v == "unfamiliar creatures" then table.remove(fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].fish, k) break end end
for _, ftype in pairs(temp_fish) do local found = false for k,v in pairs(fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].fish) do if ftype == v then found = true break end end if not found then table.insert(fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].fish, ftype) end end
-- Save data. save_fishing_db()

else
